item.title: Trump Doubles Down on Greenland Threats in Flurry of Truth Social Posts
item.description: President Trump posted private messages from France’s president and repeated his desire to take over Greenland in an overnight social media storm.

item.title: As Spain Mourns Train Crash Victims, Investigators Focus on Track
item.description: Officials on Tuesday were struggling to identify bodies from the crash near the southern city of Córdoba, which killed at least 41 people.

item.title: How the Train Crash in Spain Unfolded
item.description: Two trains collided on Sunday in southern Spain, killing at least 40 people. Here is what happened.
